data.Server: Lookups will be made using HTTPS:443 against the given server. Target must be reachable with a valid certificate.
data.DisableServerFallback: Disable fallback to upstream servers if custom server isn't reachable. Do not use this function if your server is only reachable internally.
data.Secret: If your server is publicy reachable, you can restrict answers to users which provide this secret to your server.
data.DisableCrashReports: Forces the extension to disable crash reports. When used the user can't turn reports back on.
